part-1.-novid_des: Skip the animation at the beginning of {g} startup and go directly to the main interface.
part-1.-perfectworld_des: Start {g} in Perfect World mode, suitable for players in China.
part-1.-console_des: Enable the developer console in {g} to allow inputting debugging commands.
part-1.-language schinese_des: Set the {g} interface language to Simplified Chinese, but keep the English voiceover.
part-1.-high_des: Set the CPU priority of the {g} process to high, which may improve {g} performance.
part-1.+fps_max {fps}_des: Set the {g} frame rate, with a maximum value of 1000 FPS.
part-1.-tcp_des: Force {g} to use the TCP protocol for network connections, suitable for solving UDP connection problems.
part-1.-udp_des: Force {g} to use the UDP protocol for network connections, which is the default setting.
part-1.-dev_des: Enable developer mode to unlock additional debugging features.
part-1.-enable_addons_des: Allow the engine to load custom content in the {g} folder and replace VPK files.
part-1.-override_vpk_des: Allow the engine to search for custom content in the {g} folder and replace VPK files. Using this may affect matchmaking functionality.
part-1.-nomicsettings_des: Prevent {g} from modifying microphone output values, suitable for players using other voice software.
part-1.-map dota_des: Preload the map when starting, reducing loading time when entering {g}.
part-1.-32bit_des: Run {g} in 32-bit mode, suitable for older systems or hardware.

part-2.cn-harmony_des: When enabled, black blood becomes red blood, and some skill/equipment icons are consistent with the international version.
part-2.cn-harmony_tip: Special effects files provided by Bilibili @iFuStudio

about.title: About the Program
about.description: {D} is an intelligent startup tool designed for Dota 2 players. It allows you to quickly manage {g} startup items, provide customized functional modules, and help players quickly enter the battlefield and unleash their competitive potential.
about.author: Developer
about.blurb: {D} is a professional {g} launcher that provides convenient {g} management and optimization functions.
